extendedIngredients.name: granny smith apple
extendedIngredients.original: 1 unpeeled Granny Smith apple, quartered, cored, cut into 1/4-inch-thick slices
extendedIngredients.originalName: unpeeled Granny Smith apple, quartered, cored, cut into 1/4-inch-thick slices

extendedIngredients.name: trimmed watercress
extendedIngredients.original: 1 small bunch watercress, thick stems trimmed

extendedIngredients.name: whitefish fillets
extendedIngredients.original: 12 ounces skinless smoked trout fillets or smoked whitefish fillets
extendedIngredients.originalName: skinless smoked trout fillets or smoked whitefish fillets

title: Smoked Trout and Watercress on Tart Apple Slices
summary: Smoked Trout and Watercress on Tart Apple Slices is a caveman, gluten free, dairy free, and primal recipe with 8 servings. One serving contains 54 calories, 9g of protein, and 1g of fat. For $1.09 per serving, this recipe covers 5% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. A mixture of granny smith apple, lemon juice, whitefish fillets, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so tasty. 1 person were glad they tried this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 61%. This score is pretty good. Similar recipes include Smoked Trout and Watercress Tea Sandwiches, Smoked Trout, Watercress, and Orange Salad, and Endive-Apple Slaw with Smoked Trout.
instructions: Preparation                                                        Combine apple slices and lemon juice in medium bowl; toss gently to coat. Cut trout fillets lengthwise in half, then cut each half into apple-slice-size pieces. Drain apple slices; place on platter. Top each slice with 1 watercress sprig, then 1 trout piece. Sprinkle with pepper. (Can be made 2 hours ahead. Cover and chill.) Serve.

steps.step: Combine apple slices and lemon juice in medium bowl; toss gently to coat.
Cut trout fillets lengthwise in half, then cut each half into apple-slice-size pieces.
Drain apple slices; place on platter. Top each slice with 1 watercress sprig, then 1 trout piece.
Sprinkle with pepper. (Can be made 2 hours ahead. Cover and chill.)
